auth.login.title: Login to FitOut Hub
auth.login.desc: Access your projects, track progress, and manage your account.
estimator.prompt: Enter floor area and floors to calculate...
compliance.fire: Fire strategy involves assessing compartmentation, protected routes, alarm integration, and passive/active systems. Include review of fire-stopping, passive protection, evacuation modelling and certification tracking.
compliance.structural: Structural considerations: load redistribution, reinforcement, survey of existing members, temporary works sequencing. Capture structural survey reports, design assumptions and temporary works registers.
compliance.access: Accessibility ensures inclusive design: wayfinding, tactile surfaces, lift provision, sanitary accommodation compliance. Maintain an accessibility checklist mapped to local statutory guidance.
compliance.energy: Energy & HVAC: efficient plant selection, commissioning, airflow balancing, IAQ, heat recovery, BMS tuning. Record commissioning certificates and performance benchmarks.
compliance.water: Water hygiene: legionella risk assessment, temperature control, regular flushing and monitoring regimes. Store risk assessments and ongoing monitoring logs.
compliance.waste: Waste & recycling: segregation strategy, responsible disposal tracking, circular material considerations. Track waste transfer notes and diversion metrics.
compliance.permits: Permits & notices: planning, building control, landlord approvals, statutory notifications and inspections. Maintain a master register with status, expiry and next actions.
compliance.digital: Digital records: asset tag inventory, O&M manual collation, lifecycle maintenance scheduling. Centralize asset tags and handover documentation for lifecycle planning.
cert.err.req: Please provide a material name and at least one certification file.
cert.saved: Package saved with embedded files. View in Materials Database.
